description: Advanced product catalog management system handling product information, categories, inventory levels, pricing, and search functionality. This module provides comprehensive product lifecycle management including product creation, updates, categorization, and deletion. It implements advanced search capabilities using Elasticsearch for full-text search, filtering, and faceted search. The service includes product image management, variant handling (size, color, style), bulk product operations, and integration with external product information systems. It supports complex product relationships, cross-selling recommendations, and real-time inventory tracking with low-stock alerts.

classes.name: Product
classes.description: Core product entity representing a product with all its attributes including SKU, name, description, category, pricing, and inventory information

classes.name: Category
classes.description: Category entity representing hierarchical product categories with parent-child relationships and category-specific attributes

classes.name: ProductVariant
classes.description: Product variant entity representing different variations of a product such as size, color, style with specific pricing and inventory

classes.name: ProductImage
classes.description: Product image entity storing image URLs, alt text, and ordering information for product gallery

classes.name: Inventory
classes.description: Inventory entity tracking stock levels, reserved quantities, and reorder points for products and variants

classes.name: ProductRelationship
classes.description: Entity representing relationships between products like cross-sell, upsell, and related products

classes.name: ProductDTO
classes.description: Data transfer object for product information used in API responses and requests

classes.name: CategoryDTO
classes.description: Data transfer object for category information used in API responses and requests

classes.name: ProductVariantDTO
classes.description: Data transfer object for product variant information used in API responses and requests

classes.name: ProductImageDTO
classes.description: Data transfer object for product image information used in API responses and requests

classes.name: InventoryDTO
classes.description: Data transfer object for inventory information used in API responses and requests

classes.name: ProductSearchRequest
classes.description: Data transfer object for product search requests with filtering and pagination parameters

classes.name: ProductSearchResponse
classes.description: Data transfer object for product search responses with results and faceted search information

classes.name: ProductRepository
classes.description: JPA repository interface for product CRUD operations and custom queries

classes.name: CategoryRepository
classes.description: JPA repository interface for category CRUD operations and hierarchical queries

classes.name: ProductVariantRepository
classes.description: JPA repository interface for product variant CRUD operations and variant-specific queries

classes.name: InventoryRepository
classes.description: JPA repository interface for inventory CRUD operations and stock level queries

classes.name: ProductSearchRepository
classes.description: Elasticsearch repository interface for product search operations and full-text search

classes.name: ProductService
classes.description: Core product service providing business logic for product management, CRUD operations, and product lifecycle management

classes.name: CategoryService
classes.description: Category service providing business logic for category management, hierarchical operations, and category tree management

classes.name: InventoryService
classes.description: Inventory service providing business logic for inventory management, stock level tracking, and low-stock alerts

classes.name: SearchService
classes.description: Search service providing advanced search capabilities using Elasticsearch for full-text search, filtering, and faceted search

classes.name: ImageService
classes.description: Image service providing business logic for product image management, upload, processing, and optimization

classes.name: ProductController
classes.description: REST controller providing API endpoints for product management operations including CRUD, search, and bulk operations

configFiles.description: Gradle build file for the ProductCatalog module defining dependencies, plugins, and build configuration
Configuration properties for the ProductCatalog module including database, cache, and search engine settings
